locations.config.title: Locations
locations.config.death_location.tooltip: Location created on death and removed once entered again
locations.config.disabled.tooltip: Disable the discovery of this location
locations.config.render_distance.tooltip: Distance to render this location from if used with other mods
locations.config.atlas_marker.tooltip: Marker to add to Antique Atlas (if installed)

locations.config.name_generator.tooltip: Name generator to use for this location
locations.config.xp_modifier.tooltip: XP modifier to use on discovery of this location
locations.config.connected.tooltip: Is this a multi block point, e.g. portal?
locations.config.inLocation.tooltip: Is the POI in a location, e.g. a villager workstation
